name: Pit Fighters Die
description:
Build a deck of dice. Play until one of the players cannot fill their hand of 5. 

For every attack that gets through you can hit and kill an enemy dice. 

3 AI opponents of raising difficult. With more to come.

Your deck better be the best, because once the shop runs out all your decisions are random. You'll just have to wait and watch the two decks fight it out.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

look forward to seeing what you think
